pages.text: Acquired through the Blood Magic Hellforge, you can create a Jar of Gobbee which will be spawn a Gobber Bee.

pages.title: Gobbee Jar
pages.text: The Gobbee is a Bee that helps in creating Gobber Blocks easily through either Centrifuges or Mutations, you need to use a Hellforge Altar where a Jar with a Bee (A recipe exists for which, as well), a Gobber Block and a Nether Gobber Ingot are used.
